Description:
Document type and action selection:

* 15 - price list for Distribution,
* 16 - mass cleaning of the price list,
* 17 - price list with the characteristics of the product position,
* 18 - price list with the prices of the commodity position,
* 19 - request a price list for the current date
The price list takes effect from the date
Expiration date of the price list
Commodity items (the beginning of the block)
Commodity item number (The sequence number of the item in the document (1, 2, 3, 4... n))

Action required:

* 2 - add new items,
* 3 - delete items,
* 4 - change items data

Format: Floating point number (maximal 10 symbols before dot, 3 symbols after dot)

Description: Product code according to the national classifier (UKT FEA Code)
Boxes quantity in the layer (pce in 1 level)
Commodity items (the end of the block)
